content.body: TabAtkins: It's from https://github.com/w3c/htmldiff-ui. I suspect it also impacts W3C documents relying on PR Preview?
content.formatted_body: TabAtkins: It's from https://github.com/w3c/htmldiff-ui. I suspect it also impacts W3C documents relying on PR Preview?

content.body: TabAtkins: whatpr.org is our own PR Preview domain. I didn't want ugly S3 URLs all over the place.
content.formatted_body: TabAtkins: whatpr.org is our own PR Preview domain. I didn't want ugly S3 URLs all over the place.

content.body: TabAtkins: See https://github.com/w3c/htmldiff-ui/blob/main/htmldiff.pl#L314-L331 (if you mean other styles I need a more specific question I think)

content.body: Just to pile on the Bikeshed API server a bit more, it seems like it hasn't been updated since a random commit in September, https://github.com/speced/bikeshed/issues/2762
Someone should write a version of htmldiff.pl that doesn't insert random spaces everywhere
